column1: Baby Barnaby's////I just moved to the area and I love trying all of the restaurants around my new apartment! Baby Barnaby's is so so delicious. My friend and I woke up early and decided to check this place out. When we walked up to this location
column2: the workers outside greeted us and we sat inside. Luckily there was no wait when we arrived. The restaurant itself isn't very big but then again I guess that's why its called Baby? Haha...but it is a really cute restaurant and has a very welcoming feel to it. They have this orange juice machine that I was fascinated by and I loved watching them make the orange juice. I'm sure no one else will think much about it but I was really entertained !
